about_the_game:
• Smooth High-Velocity Platformer Movement
  • Change the game world by Creating/Destroying Objects
  • Obtainable Gear (Hats, Gloves, Shoes) changes up gameplay.
  • Find Hidden Collectables in every stage to Unlock Challange Stages.
  • Level Objectives reward multiple completions of stages.
  • Velocity Runs encourage you to creatively "break" stages for record times.
  • Dominate Enemy/Boss Encounters using every ability available.



Go Rollo Go is a high-velocity 2D Platformer where the world is yours to control. RIP sections out of the world and REPLACE them with chunks that allow faster movement and combat advantage. REARRANGE environmental objects like flippers and platforms to propel you forward. ROTATE the World and Gravity at any time to zoom past traps or enemies. ROLL your way around awesome loops to snag collectables. Its all PHYSICS so every ZIP, FLIP, GRIP and DIP is totally in your control.





RIP can be used to find secrets, avoid hazards, and even speed up course times by removing pieces of the world at will.



REPLACE non-existent or treacherous terrain with your own safe passage. Drop physical objects to harm enemies or create landings. Created objects have a variety of uses. Keep your eyes open for surprising oppotunites.



REARRANGE objects in the world to improve your run. Take a free ride by raising/lowering platforms. Get a crazy boost of speed by triggering flippers. Fire away with aimable launchers and more.



ROTATE the world to dodge traps and gain ground. Shave those clear times in half by finding perfect angles to free fall your way through levels. Spin your way through fast-paced MAZE LEVELS inspired by arcade classics.



ROLL your way into narrow or hidden spaces to scavenge items and secrets. Scale vertical surfaces with no problem and zip around loops at high speeds.

name: Go Rollo Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Ciore 2.0 GHZ or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen 5700 / Nvidia 2070
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Dual Ciore 2.0 GHZ or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen 5700 / Nvidia 2070 or Better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: RIP, REPLACE, REARRANGE, ROTATE and ROLL on a vibrant high-velocity adventure to Craft the Ultimate Smoothie, Save the Multiverse, and Decorate your Base!
